projects.title: E-commerce manager
projects.description: Site / application developed for Boot camp for the company CloudWalk, from a petshop E-commerce, where the manager of this E-commerce can have access to an administration area, being able to add or change products, also upload spreadsheets with data for their products.

projects.title: Online Bingo
projects.description: Project developed for Bootcamp for the company Ploomes, Bingo is an application where the user can enter to have fun, once he creates his user he can choose a certain amount of cards, as well as drawn numbers to increase the difficulty, then he will be able to play his bingo, for the championship belt
